content.raw: Yeah, it seems like most of the time is in Ogre's `saveAllTerrains()` call.  Maybe there's a way to cache and reuse the generated subterrains from previous runs?  That would require appropriate checksumming to make sure that the right data is being used.  Probably should be an optimization that we add later.
content.html: Yeah, it seems like most of the time is in Ogre's saveAllTerrains() call. Maybe there's a way to cache and reuse the generated subterrains from previous runs? That would require appropriate checksumming to make sure that the right data is being used. Probably should be an optimization that we add later.
